column5: Cozy, romantic and crisp, the recently renovated Betty's Breakwater room offers accommodations for two (2) guests. It was named after Betty Chastain in honor of Kelly's mom. Recent updates include all new wood flooring, accent wallcovering, furnishings and lighting, bed and bath linens and window coverings. It is complete with a queen bed, private full bathroom, coffee station with complimentary coffee and assorted teas, small refrigerator, AC/Heat. Can connect to the Safari Safari room.
